summary: Small improvements to the player home in AlexanderJVelicky\'s Falskaar mod.  Includes my recipe patch.
descriptionHtml:
Adds more crafting station storage, all remaining crafting stations, a map marker, and a live-in merchant to the player home in Falskaar.

The live-in merchant Selena has 30,000 gold, black soul gems, all ingots and ore\'s, and several alchemy ingredients for sale in large quantities.

All additions are added as you buy the house upgrades.

Falskaar is required for this mod.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37994

Optional requirement for Apachii Sky Hair Female version 1.3
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168

Added a no merchant version.

New version 1.01 includes recipe patch from my other mod Falskaar Recipe Patch
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/38530

Removed version 1.01, recipe fix now included in latest Falskaar release.

Please endorse if you like!

Credits to Alexander J Velicky for his excellent Falskaar Mod (DLC really!)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37994
author: rsck3405
